## Innleiðing

This lesson covers multiplying and dividing fractions (falda og býta).

### Example

$$
\frac{a}{b} \cdot \frac{c}{d} = \frac{ac}{bd}
$$

$$
\frac{a}{b} \div \frac{c}{d} = \frac{a}{b} \cdot \frac{d}{c}
$$
